title: Touched by Lightning
description:
We realized too late we were the ones being hunted.





We’d been searching for our enemy for months, looking for the person killing our kind, the person taking the lightning that literally ran through our veins.They could run but they couldn’t hide, not from us.
Or so we thought.





This is the prequel to "Lightning Kissed", an upcoming reverse harem series.
author: Quirah Casey
